title: Otoko ga Otoko wo Aisuru Toki Series
original_name: 男が男を愛する時 シリーズ
sinopse:
Story of several guys working in host clubs. Professional rivalry, mistaken identities, unrequited love, and jealousy on a semi-regular basis.

Otoko ga Otoko wo Aisuru Toki Series:

1. Otoko ga Otoko wo Aisuru Toki
2. Last Waltz (2 volumes)
3. Nightcap
4. Irokoi (3 volumes)
5. U:V (2 volumes)
